H0.text: In 2005, Dan Wheldon became the first British competitor to win what event in over 30 years. 24 Hours of Le Mans

H1.text: In 2005, Dan Wheldon became the first British competitor to win what event in over 30 years. Monaco Grand Prix

H2.text: In 2005, Dan Wheldon became the first British competitor to win what event in over 30 years. Daytona 500

H3.text: In 2005, Dan Wheldon became the first British competitor to win what event in over 30 years. Indy500

A4.text: Dan Wheldon became the first British-born winner since Graham Hill in 1966.
